item.title: How many test chambers are there in portal?
item.dc:creator: Serza
item.description:
When I’m done explaining the amount of test chambers in Portal series, you’ll think your pilot’s license has been revoked with a Gravity Gun, held by a Heavy wielding an ice bow, while being covered by an AWP.

There. I think that sentence made a reference to every major Valve game. I’m a a badass.

To the topic.

Total, in singleplayer for both games, I count around a hundred chambers, including counting certain portions as chambers.

In coop, there’s about 60 chambers, give or take five.

Solved it for ya.

P.S.: I didn’t play Portal for about two months now (way too long, hehe), so it might not be entirely spot on.

Read full topic
item.source: How many test chambers are there in portal?

item.title: How many test chambers are there in portal?
item.dc:creator: MSKyuuni
item.description:
Nineteen, but you’ve made a pretty silly mistake. “The Test Chamber” subforum is for usermade content
This should be in “Technology & Gaming”.
EDIT: Or “Half-Life Series”
